data.title: Happy Birthday, Yoko Ono! _ Born February 18, 1933 in Tokyo, Japan, multimedia artist, singer, songwriter and peace activist Yoko Ono...
data.meta_description:
3,963 likes, 34 comments - moca on February 18, 2024: "Happy Birthday, Yoko Ono!
_

Born February 18, 1933 in Tokyo, Japan, multimedia artist, singer, songwriter and peace activist Yoko Ono creates works that challenge the notion that art must be a physical object designed by the artist to be viewed passively by the audience. 

Her instruction piece, “Painting to Hammer a Nail In” (1961), featured here, invites audiences to hammer a nail into the painting using the hammer chained to the canvas. The experience of hammering away at the work is part of the art, making the viewer a part of the piece and fostering a collaborative effort between artist and viewer. 

Join us in sending warm wishes to Yoko Ono on her birthday! 

—

Portrait: @YokoOno official, New York, 1960

Yoko Ono, Painting to Hammer a Nail In, 1961-1998, Bronze With Patina, Painting: 11 1/2 x 8 3/4 x 4 1/4 in. (29.21 x 22.23 x 10.8 cm) Hammer: 12 1/2 x 5 x 3/4 in. (31.75 x 12.7 x 1.91 cm), The Museum of Contemporary Art, Los Angeles. Gift of The Audrey and Sydney Irmas Charitable Foundation".
